metadata.ttm:title: Ordering Information
metadata.ttm:desc: Include details on how your Company wishes to receives Orders in the Order Information Template. You may select either Facsimile Transmission, or Computer-to-Computer Electronic Data Interchange, (EDI). Selecting EDI requires contact information for the Company representative responsible for establishing the EDI connection.

div.p: Two entries are required in the "Ordering
Information" screen - "Ordering Receipt
Information" and "Remittance Address."
You will need to add information for each of
these items in the drop down menu.
Choose either option from the drop down menu and
click "Add Ordering Information Details."
Begin by selecting whether you would prefer to
receive orders via fax or electronically.
If you select "Facsimile transmission," you need to
enter the "Fax number" where the government
should send order requests.
When selecting "Facsimile transmission," you do not
need to enter the "Contact information" in the area
below Instead of receiving orders via fax, you can
elect to establish an electronic means for
receipt of orders.
Select the "Computer to Computer Electronic Data
Interchange" option.
In order to receive orders via Electronic Data
Interchange (or EDI), you will need to set up an
interface with the government.
You do not need to set up the interface prior to
contract award, however, you do need to provide the
contact information for the person who will be
responsible for setting up the EDI.
This person will need to contact GSA after the
contract is awarded to establish the interface.
If opting to receive orders via EDI, provide
all the relevant contact information including
"Name," "Title," "Address," "City,"
"State," "Zip," "Country," "Phone," and "E-mail
address."
Click "Add Ordering Information" when
complete.
The Ordering information with appear in the table
below with the ability to "Edit" or "Delete" the
entry.
Continue adding the relevant ordering
information for your offer.
When you are finished click Back to Solicitation
Clauses.
